Text: The ppv was on Showtime, not HBO
I'm so glad I didn't pay for this snooze-fest. Don't bother watching.

you'd have to be an idiot to pay for a pillow fighter like Mayweather...he cherry picks the easiest fights for him and then bores us to death...they claimed to have sold 1 million ppv's....I doubt it....1 million retarded black and hispanics...hell, I'm surprised there's that many who can afford it
